title: Getting around in French
creator_credit: Harry Mehlman and Educational TV Services
brief_description: Students from Assumption College, Kilmore and Nunawading HIgh School are shown in a number of situations using French language skills they have acquired from the Eclair French language course. Various situations are depicted and the program concludes with students giving their opinions on the Eclair course of study.
